name: GetProjectDetails
description:
Retrieve complete details of a specified Asana project.

This tool retrieves the complete record of a specific project from Asana. It requires 'projects:read' scope and additional scopes for accessing custom field settings and team information, if needed.

parameters.name: project_global_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the Asana project you want to retrieve details for.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: A list of optional property names to include in the project details response. Provide these as a list of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for nicely formatted, readable output, mainly for debugging due to increased size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
